item.title: Trump admin live updates: White House backtracks on renaming Veterans Day
item.description: The White House is backtracking after President Donald Trump said in a social media post that he was renaming Veterans Day.

item.title: RFK Jr. unveils 'radical' change to vaccine testing
item.description: A Department of Health and Human Services spokesperson called the move "a radical departure from past practices."
